file_content.text: This is Meldo. Doctor Orlian's here. We're leaving the facility now. I'll file my report with Suria once we're at the safe house.
Bring Doctor Orlian to the rendezvous point, and I'll get him to safety.
Agent Meldo? Your boss sent me to meet with you.
I should have known Suria would start to freak out if I didn't file my reports.
Everything's got to be exactly by the book with her.
She seems a little obsessed with rules and regulations.
I noticed that.
You got that right. She has no idea how to improvise or adapt. Makes it tough to run an effective field operation.
Isn't that a good thing?
Rules and regulations don't always work too well in the field. A good agent has to know how to roll with the punches.
We were worried your cover was blown.
Why haven't you kept in touch?
Security here is tighter than we expected. The Imps are watching everyone, including me and Doctor Orlian.
I was waiting for the right time to approach him. Should have known Suria would end up sticking her nose in if I took too long.
When you stopped filing reports, she got worried.
Can you blame her?
She was worried about the mission, not me. She's got to learn to trust her agents.
Sounds like you have everything under control here after all.
So you want me to go?
Things were moving along slowly but surely.
Now that you're here, though, I might as well make use of your talents. Improvise and adapt, I say.
The time for waiting is over.
Actually, that's not a bad idea. Maybe we can wrap this up sooner than I originally planned. Improvise and adapt, right?
Doctor Orlian is in the lab. Bring him here to the rendezvous, and I'll make sure he gets to one of our SIS safe houses.
I can't talk to you right now.
